main event: A sighting of a white point of light in the sky that appeared to move quickly to the north.
interesting points: The object was described as looking like a star or balloon that was very close to the ground., The object moved too fast to be a star., The observation lasted approximately 2 minutes., The object was silent and emitted no sound., The observer was located in Jefferson, St. Clair County, Michigan.
location: Jefferson, St. Clair County, Michigan, USA
witness description: details about the observer's identity have been redacted
